006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function; // NOPMD - intentional
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.math.BigDecimal;
023import java.math.BigInteger;
024import java.time.Duration;
025import java.time.Period;
026import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
027import java.time.temporal.TemporalAmount;
028import java.util.Set;
029
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
031import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
032
033public final class OperationFunctions { // NOPMD - intentional
034  @NonNull
035  public static final Set<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>> AGGREGATE_MATH_TYPES = ObjectUtils.notNull(Set.of(
036      IDayTimeDurationItem.class,
037      IYearMonthDurationItem.class,
038      INumericItem.class));
039
040  private OperationFunctions() {
041    // disable
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
046   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDuration-to-date">op:add-yearMonthDuration-to-date</a>.
047   *
048   * @param instant
049   *          a point in time
050   * @param duration
051   *          the duration to add
052   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
053   */
054  @NonNull
055  public static IDateItem opAddYearMonthDurationToDate(@NonNull IDateItem instant,
056      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
057    return addDurationToDate(instant.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asPeriod());
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
062   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDuration-to-date">op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-date</a>.
063   *
064   * @param instant
065   *          a point in time
066   * @param duration
067   *          the duration to add
068   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
069   */
070  @NonNull
071  public static IDateItem opAddDayTimeDurationToDate(@NonNull IDateItem instant,
072      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
073    return addDurationToDate(instant.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asDuration());
074  }
075
076  @NonNull
077  private static IDateItem addDurationToDate(@NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime, @NonNull TemporalAmount duration) {
078    ZonedDateTime result;
079    try {
080      result = dateTime.plus(duration);
081    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
082      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
083    }
084    assert result != null;
085    return IDateItem.valueOf(result);
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
090   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDurations">op:add-yearMonthDurations</a>.
091   *
092   * @param arg1
093   *          the first duration
094   * @param arg2
095   *          the second duration
096   * @return the sum of two duration values
097   */
098  @NonNull
099  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opAddYearMonthDurations(
100      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
101      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
102    Period duration1 = arg1.asPeriod();
103    Period duration2 = arg2.asPeriod();
104
105    Period result;
106    try {
107      result = duration1.plus(duration2);
108    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
109      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
110    }
111    assert result != null;
112    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(result);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
117   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDurations">op:add-dayTimeDurations</a>.
118   *
119   * @param arg1
120   *          the first duration
121   * @param arg2
122   *          the second duration
123   * @return the sum of two duration values
124   */
125  @NonNull
126  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opAddDayTimeDurations(
127      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
128      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
129    Duration duration1 = arg1.asDuration();
130    Duration duration2 = arg2.asDuration();
131
132    Duration result;
133    try {
134      result = duration1.plus(duration2);
135    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
136      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
137    }
138    assert result != null;
139    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(result);
140  }
141
142  /**
143   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
144   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-yearMonthDuration-to-dateTime">op:add-yearMonthDuration-to-dateTime</a>.
145   *
146   * @param instant
147   *          a point in time
148   * @param duration
149   *          the duration to add
150   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
151   */
152  @NonNull
153  public static IDateTimeItem opAddYearMonthDurationToDateTime(
154      @NonNull IDateTimeItem instant,
155      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
156    ZonedDateTime result;
157    try {
158      result = instant.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asPeriod());
159    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
160      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
161    }
162    assert result != null;
163    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(result);
164  }
165
166  /**
167   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
168   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime">op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime</a>.
169   *
170   * @param instant
171   *          a point in time
172   * @param duration
173   *          the duration to add
174   * @return the result of adding the duration to the date
175   */
176  @NonNull
177  public static IDateTimeItem opAddDayTimeDurationToDateTime(
178      @NonNull IDateTimeItem instant,
179      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
180    ZonedDateTime result;
181    try {
182      result = instant.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asDuration());
183    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
184      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
185    }
186    assert result != null;
187    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(result);
188  }
189
190  /**
191   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
192   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dates">op:subtract-dates</a>.
193   *
194   * @param date1
195   *          the first point in time
196   * @param date2
197   *          the second point in time
198   * @return the elapsed time between the starting instant and ending instant
199   */
200  @NonNull
201  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDates(@NonNull IDateItem date1, @NonNull IDateItem date2) {
202    return between(date1.asZonedDateTime(), date2.asZonedDateTime());
203  }
204
205  /**
206   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
207   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-date">op:subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-date</a>.
208   *
209   * @param date
210   *          a point in time
211   * @param duration
212   *          the duration to subtract
213   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from the date
214   */
215  @NonNull
216  public static IDateItem opSubtractYearMonthDurationFromDate(
217      @NonNull IDateItem date,
218      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
219    return subtractDurationFromDate(date.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asPeriod());
220  }
221
222  /**
223   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
224   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-date">op:subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-date</a>.
225   *
226   * @param date
227   *          a point in time
228   * @param duration
229   *          the duration to subtract
230   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from the date
231   */
232  @NonNull
233  public static IDateItem opSubtractDayTimeDurationFromDate(
234      @NonNull IDateItem date,
235      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
236    return subtractDurationFromDate(date.asZonedDateTime(), duration.asDuration());
237  }
238
239  @NonNull
240  private static IDateItem subtractDurationFromDate(
241      @NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime,
242      @NonNull TemporalAmount duration) {
243    @SuppressWarnings("null")
244    @NonNull ZonedDateTime result = dateTime.minus(duration);
245    return IDateItem.valueOf(result);
246  }
247
248  /**
249   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
250   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDurations">op:subtract-yearMonthDurations</a>.
251   *
252   * @param arg1
253   *          the first duration
254   * @param arg2
255   *          the second duration
256   * @return the result of subtracting the second duration from the first
257   */
258  @NonNull
259  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opSubtractYearMonthDurations(
260      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
261      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
262    Period duration1 = arg1.asPeriod();
263    Period duration2 = arg2.asPeriod();
264
265    @SuppressWarnings("null")
266    @NonNull Period duration = duration1.minus(duration2);
267    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(duration);
268  }
269
270  /**
271   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
272   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDurations">op:subtract-dayTimeDurations</a>.
273   *
274   * @param arg1
275   *          the first duration
276   * @param arg2
277   *          the second duration
278   * @return the result of subtracting the second duration from the first
279   */
280  @NonNull
281  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDayTimeDurations(
282      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
283      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
284    Duration duration1 = arg1.asDuration();
285    Duration duration2 = arg2.asDuration();
286
287    @SuppressWarnings("null")
288    @NonNull Duration duration = duration1.minus(duration2);
289    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(duration);
290  }
291
292  /**
293   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
294   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dateTimes">op:subtract-dateTimes</a>.
295   *
296   * @param time1
297   *          the first point in time
298   * @param time2
299   *          the second point in time
300   * @return the duration the occurred between the two points in time
301   */
302  @NonNull
303  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opSubtractDateTimes(@NonNull IDateTimeItem time1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem time2) {
304    return between(time1.asZonedDateTime(), time2.asZonedDateTime());
305  }
306
307  /**
308   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
309   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dateTimes">op:subtract-dateTimes</a>.
310   *
311   * @param time1
312   *          the first point in time
313   * @param time2
314   *          the second point in time
315   * @return the duration the occurred between the two points in time
316   */
317  @NonNull
318  private static IDayTimeDurationItem between(@NonNull ZonedDateTime time1, @NonNull ZonedDateTime time2) {
319    @SuppressWarnings("null")
320    @NonNull Duration between = Duration.between(time1, time2);
321    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(between);
322  }
323
324  /**
325   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
326   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-dateTime">op:subtract-yearMonthDuration-from-dateTime</a>.
327   *
328   * @param moment
329   *          a point in time
330   * @param duration
331   *          the duration to subtract
332   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from a point in time
333   */
334  @NonNull
335  public static IDateTimeItem opSubtractYearMonthDurationFromDateTime(
336      @NonNull IDateTimeItem moment,
337      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem duration) {
338    @SuppressWarnings("null")
339    @NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime = moment.asZonedDateTime().minus(duration.asPeriod());
340    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(dateTime);
341  }
342
343  /**
344   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
345   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-dateTime">op:subtract-dayTimeDuration-from-dateTime</a>.
346   *
347   * @param moment
348   *          a point in time
349   * @param duration
350   *          the duration to subtract
351   * @return the result of subtracting the duration from a point in time
352   */
353  @NonNull
354  public static IDateTimeItem opSubtractDayTimeDurationFromDateTime(
355      @NonNull IDateTimeItem moment,
356      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem duration) {
357
358    @SuppressWarnings("null")
359    @NonNull ZonedDateTime dateTime = moment.asZonedDateTime().plus(duration.asDuration());
360    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(dateTime);
361  }
362
363  /**
364   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
365   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-multiply-yearMonthDuration">op:multiply-yearMonthDuration</a>.
366   *
367   * @param arg1
368   *          the duration value
369   * @param arg2
370   *          the number to multiply by
371   * @return the result of multiplying a {@link IYearMonthDurationItem} by a
372   *         number
373   */
374  @NonNull
375  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opMultiplyYearMonthDuration(
376      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
377      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
378    int arg2Int;
379    try {
380      arg2Int = FunctionUtils.asInteger(arg2.round());
381    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
382      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
383    }
384
385    @SuppressWarnings("null")
386    @NonNull Period period = arg1.asPeriod().multipliedBy(arg2Int);
387    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(period);
388  }
389
390  /**
391   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
392   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-multiply-dayTimeDuration">op:multiply-dayTimeDuration</a>.
393   *
394   * @param arg1
395   *          the duration value
396   * @param arg2
397   *          the number to multiply by
398   * @return the result of multiplying a {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} by a number
399   */
400  @NonNull
401  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opMultiplyDayTimeDuration(
402      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
403      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
404    long arg2Long;
405    try {
406      arg2Long = FunctionUtils.asLong(arg2.round());
407    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
408      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR, ex);
409    }
410
411    @SuppressWarnings("null")
412    @NonNull Duration duration = arg1.asDuration().multipliedBy(arg2Long);
413    return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(duration);
414  }
415
416  /**
417   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
418   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-yearMonthDuration">op:divide-yearMonthDuration</a>.
419   *
420   * @param arg1
421   *          the duration value
422   * @param arg2
423   *          the number to divide by
424   * @return the result of dividing a {@link IYearMonthDurationItem} by a number
425   */
426  @NonNull
427  public static IYearMonthDurationItem opDivideYearMonthDuration(
428      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
429      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
430    IIntegerItem totalMonths = IIntegerItem.valueOf(arg1.asPeriod().toTotalMonths());
431    IIntegerItem result = opNumericIntegerDivide(totalMonths, arg2);
432    int months;
433    try {
434      months = FunctionUtils.asInteger(result.asInteger());
435    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
436      throw new DateTimeFunctionException(DateTimeFunctionException.DURATION_OVERFLOW_UNDERFLOW_ERROR,
437          "Overflow/underflow in duration operation.", ex);
438    }
439    int years = months / 12;
440    months = months % 12;
441    return IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(years, months);
442  }
443
444  /**
445   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
446   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-dayTimeDuration">op:divide-dayTimeDuration</a>.
447   *
448   * @param arg1
449   *          the duration value
450   * @param arg2
451   *          the number to divide by
452   * @return the result of dividing a {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} by a number
453   */
454  @NonNull
455  public static IDayTimeDurationItem opDivideDayTimeDuration(
456      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
457      @NonNull INumericItem arg2) {
458    try {
459      @SuppressWarnings("null")
460      @NonNull Duration duration = arg1.asDuration().dividedBy(FunctionUtils.asLong(arg2.round()));
461      return IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(duration);
462    } catch (ArithmeticException ex) {
463      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO, "Division by zero", ex);
464    }
465  }
466
467  /**
468   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
469   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-divide-dayTimeDuration-by-dayTimeDuration">op:divide-dayTimeDuration-by-dayTimeDuration</a>.
470   *
471   * @param arg1
472   *          the first duration value
473   * @param arg2
474   *          the second duration value
475   * @return the ratio of two {@link IDayTimeDurationItem} values, as a decimal
476   *         number
477   */
478  @NonNull
479  public static IDecimalItem opDivideDayTimeDurationByDayTimeDuration(
480      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
481      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
482    return IDecimalItem.cast(
483        opNumericDivide(
484            IDecimalItem.valueOf(arg1.asSeconds()),
485            IDecimalItem.valueOf(arg2.asSeconds())));
486  }
487
488  /**
489   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
490   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-equal">op:date-equal</a>.
491   *
492   * @param arg1
493   *          the first value
494   * @param arg2
495   *          the second value
496   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same instant in time as the
497   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
498   */
499  @NonNull
500  public static IBooleanItem opDateEqual(@NonNull IDateItem arg1, @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
501    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().equals(arg2.asZonedDateTime()));
502  }
503
504  /**
505   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
506   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-equal">op:dateTime-equal</a>.
507   *
508   * @param arg1
509   *          the first value
510   * @param arg2
511   *          the second value
512   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same instant in time as the
513   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
514   */
515  @NonNull
516  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeEqual(@NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
517    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().equals(arg2.asZonedDateTime()));
518  }
519
520  /**
521   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
522   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-duration-equal">op:duration-equal</a>.
523   *
524   * @param arg1
525   *          the first value
526   * @param arg2
527   *          the second value
528   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is the same duration as the
529   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
530   */
531  @NonNull
532  public static IBooleanItem opDurationEqual(@NonNull IDurationItem arg1, @NonNull IDurationItem arg2) {
533    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) == 0);
534  }
535
536  /**
537   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
538   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-equal">op:base64Binary-equal</a>.
539   *
540   * @param arg1
541   *          the first value
542   * @param arg2
543   *          the second value
544   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is equal to the second, or
545   *         {@code false} otherwise
546   */
547  @NonNull
548  public static IBooleanItem opBase64BinaryEqual(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg1, @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {
549    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asByteBuffer().equals(arg2.asByteBuffer()));
550  }
551
552  /**
553   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
554   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-greater-than">op:date-greater-than</a>.
555   *
556   * @param arg1
557   *          the first value
558   * @param arg2
559   *          the second value
560   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a later instant in time than
561   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
562   */
563  @NonNull
564  public static IBooleanItem opDateGreaterThan(@NonNull IDateItem arg1, @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
565    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) > 0);
566  }
567
568  /**
569   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
570   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-greater-than">op:dateTime-greater-than</a>.
571   *
572   * @param arg1
573   *          the first value
574   * @param arg2
575   *          the second value
576   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a later instant in time than
577   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
578   */
579  @NonNull
580  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeGreaterThan(@NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1, @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
581    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) > 0);
582  }
583
584  /**
585   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
586   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-yearMonthDuration-greater-than">op:yearMonthDuration-greater-than</a>.
587   *
588   * @param arg1
589   *          the first value
590   * @param arg2
591   *          the second value
592   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a longer duration than the
593   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
594   */
595  @NonNull
596  public static IBooleanItem opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
597      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
598      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
599    Period p1 = arg1.asPeriod();
600    Period p2 = arg2.asPeriod();
601
602    // this is only an approximation
603    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(p1.toTotalMonths() > p2.toTotalMonths());
604  }
605
606  /**
607   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
608   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dayTimeDuration-greater-than">op:dayTimeDuration-greater-than</a>.
609   *
610   * @param arg1
611   *          the first value
612   * @param arg2
613   *          the second value
614   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a longer duration than the
615   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
616   */
617  @NonNull
618  public static IBooleanItem opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
619      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
620      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
621    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) > 0);
622  }

624  /**
625   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
626   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-greater-than">op:base64Binary-greater-than</a>.
627   *
628   * @param arg1
629   *          the first value
630   * @param arg2
631   *          the second value
632   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is greater than the second, or
633   *         {@code false} otherwise
634   */
635  @NonNull
636  public static IBooleanItem opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(
637      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg1,
638      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {
639    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) > 0);
640  }

642  /**
643   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
644   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-date-less-than">op:date-less-than</a>.
645   *
646   * @param arg1
647   *          the first value
648   * @param arg2
649   *          the second value
650   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is an earlier instant in time than
651   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
652   */
653  @NonNull
654  public static IBooleanItem opDateLessThan(
655      @NonNull IDateItem arg1,
656      @NonNull IDateItem arg2) {
657    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) < 0);
658  }

660  /**
661   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
662   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dateTime-less-than">op:dateTime-less-than</a>.
663   *
664   * @param arg1
665   *          the first value
666   * @param arg2
667   *          the second value
668   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is an earlier instant in time than
669   *         the second, or {@code false} otherwise
670   */
671  @NonNull
672  public static IBooleanItem opDateTimeLessThan(
673      @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg1,
674      @NonNull IDateTimeItem arg2) {
675    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asZonedDateTime().compareTo(arg2.asZonedDateTime()) < 0);
676  }

678  /**
679   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
680   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-yearMonthDuration-less-than">op:yearMonthDuration-less-than</a>.
681   *
682   * @param arg1
683   *          the first value
684   * @param arg2
685   *          the second value
686   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is a shorter duration than the
687   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
688   */
689  @NonNull
690  public static IBooleanItem opYearMonthDurationLessThan(@NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg1,
691      @NonNull IYearMonthDurationItem arg2) {
692    Period p1 = arg1.asPeriod();
693    Period p2 = arg2.asPeriod();
694
695    // this is only an approximation
696    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(p1.toTotalMonths() < p2.toTotalMonths());
697  }

700   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
701   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-dayTimeDuration-less-than">op:dayTimeDuration-less-than</a>.

705   * @param arg2

708   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
709   */
710  @NonNull
711  public static IBooleanItem opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
712      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg1,
713      @NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem arg2) {
714    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.compareTo(arg2) < 0);

718   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
719   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base64Binary-less-than">op:base64Binary-less-than</a>.
720   *

728  @NonNull

731      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem arg2) {

735  /**
736   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
737   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-add">op:numeric-add</a>.
738   *
739   * @param left
740   *          the first number
741   * @param right
742   *          the second number
743   * @return the result of adding the second number to the first number
744   */
745  @NonNull
746  public static INumericItem opNumericAdd(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
747    INumericItem retval;
748    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
749      // create an integer result
750      BigInteger integerLeft = left.asInteger();
751      BigInteger integerRight = right.asInteger();
752
753      @SuppressWarnings("null")
754      @NonNull BigInteger result = integerLeft.add(integerRight);
755      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
756    } else {
757      // create a decimal result
758      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
759      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
760
761      @SuppressWarnings("null")
762      @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimalLeft.add(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
763      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
764    }
765    return retval;
766  }
767
768  /**
769   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
770   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-subtract">op:numeric-subtract</a>.
771   *
772   * @param left
773   *          the first number
774   * @param right
775   *          the second number
776   * @return the result of subtracting the second number from the first number
777   */
778  @NonNull
779  public static INumericItem opNumericSubtract(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
780    INumericItem retval;
781    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
782      // create an integer result
783      BigInteger integerLeft = left.asInteger();
784      BigInteger integerRight = right.asInteger();
785
786      @SuppressWarnings("null")
787      @NonNull BigInteger result = integerLeft.subtract(integerRight);
788      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
789    } else {
790      // create a decimal result
791      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
792      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
793
794      @SuppressWarnings("null")
795      @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimalLeft.subtract(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
796      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
797    }
798    return retval;
799  }
800
801  /**
802   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
803   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-multiply">op:numeric-multiply</a>.
804   *
805   * @param left
806   *          the first number
807   * @param right
808   *          the second number
809   * @return the result of multiplying the first number by the second number
810   */
811  @NonNull
812  public static INumericItem opNumericMultiply(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull INumericItem right) {
813    INumericItem retval;
814    if (left instanceof IIntegerItem || right instanceof IIntegerItem) {
815      // create an integer result
816      @SuppressWarnings("null")
817      @NonNull BigInteger result = left.asInteger().multiply(right.asInteger());
818      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
819    } else {
820      // create a decimal result
821      BigDecimal decimalLeft = left.asDecimal();
822      BigDecimal decimalRight = right.asDecimal();
823
824      @SuppressWarnings("null")
825      @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimalLeft.multiply(decimalRight, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
826      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
827    }
828    return retval;
829  }
830
831  /**
832   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
833   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-divide">op:numeric-divide</a>.
834   *
835   * @param dividend
836   *          the number to be divided
837   * @param divisor
838   *          the number to divide by
839   * @return the quotient
840   */
841  @NonNull
842  public static IDecimalItem opNumericDivide(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
843    // create a decimal result
844    BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
845
846    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
847      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
848          ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
849    }
850
851    BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
852
853    @SuppressWarnings("null")
854    @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimalDividend.divide(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
855    return IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
856  }
857
858  /**
859   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
860   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-integer-divide">op:numeric-integer-divide</a>.
861   *
862   * @param dividend
863   *          the number to be divided
864   * @param divisor
865   *          the number to divide by
866   * @return the quotient
867   */
868  @NonNull
869  public static IIntegerItem opNumericIntegerDivide(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
870    IIntegerItem retval;
871    if (dividend instanceof IIntegerItem || divisor instanceof IIntegerItem) {
872      // create an integer result
873      BigInteger integerDivisor = divisor.asInteger();
874
875      if (BigInteger.ZERO.equals(integerDivisor)) {
876        throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
877            ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
878      }
879
880      @SuppressWarnings("null")
881      @NonNull BigInteger result = dividend.asInteger().divide(integerDivisor);
882      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
883    } else {
884      // create a decimal result
885      BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
886
887      if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
888        throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
889            ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
890      }
891
892      BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
893
894      @SuppressWarnings("null")
895      @NonNull BigInteger result
896          = decimalDividend.divideToIntegralValue(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT).toBigInteger();
897      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
898    }
899    return retval;
900  }
901
902  /**
903   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
904   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-mod">op:numeric-mod</a>.
905   *
906   * @param dividend
907   *          the number to be divided
908   * @param divisor
909   *          the number to divide by
910   * @return the remainder
911   */
912  @NonNull
913  public static INumericItem opNumericMod(@NonNull INumericItem dividend, @NonNull INumericItem divisor) {
914    BigDecimal decimalDivisor = divisor.asDecimal();
915
916    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDivisor)) {
917      throw new ArithmeticFunctionException(ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO,
918          ArithmeticFunctionException.DIVISION_BY_ZERO_MESSAGE);
919    }
920
921    BigDecimal decimalDividend = dividend.asDecimal();
922
923    INumericItem retval;
924    if (BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(decimalDividend)) {
925      retval = dividend;
926    } else {
927      @SuppressWarnings("null")
928      @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimalDividend.remainder(decimalDivisor, FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
929      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
930    }
931    return retval;
932  }
933
934  /**
935   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
936   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-unary-minus">op:numeric-unary-minus</a>.
937   *
938   * @param item
939   *          the number whose sign is to be reversed
940   * @return the number with a reversed sign
941   */
942  @NonNull
943  public static INumericItem opNumericUnaryMinus(@NonNull INumericItem item) {
944    INumericItem retval;
945    if (item instanceof IIntegerItem) {
946      // create a decimal result
947      BigInteger integer = item.asInteger();
948
949      @SuppressWarnings("null")
950      @NonNull BigInteger result = integer.negate();
951      retval = IIntegerItem.valueOf(result);
952    } else if (item instanceof IDecimalItem) {
953      // create a decimal result
954      BigDecimal decimal = item.asDecimal();
955
956      @SuppressWarnings("null")
957      @NonNull BigDecimal result = decimal.negate(FunctionUtils.MATH_CONTEXT);
958      retval = IDecimalItem.valueOf(result);
959    } else {
960      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(item);
961    }
962    return retval;
963  }
964
965  /**
966   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
967   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-equal">op:numeric-equal</a>.
968   *
969   * @param arg1
970   *          the first number to check for equality
971   * @param arg2
972   *          the second number to check for equality
973   * @return {@code true} if the numbers are numerically equal or {@code false}
974   *         otherwise
975   */
976  @NonNull
977  public static IBooleanItem opNumericEqual(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
978    IBooleanItem retval;
979    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
980      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
981    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
982      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asInteger().equals(arg2.asInteger()));
983    } else {
984      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(arg1.asDecimal().equals(arg2.asDecimal()));
985    }
986    return retval;
987  }
988
989  /**
990   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
991   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-greater-than">op:numeric-greater-than</a>.
992   *
993   * @param arg1
994   *          the first number to check
995   * @param arg2
996   *          the second number to check
997   * @return {@code true} if the first number is greater than or equal to the
998   *         second, or {@code false} otherwise
999   */
1000  @NonNull
1001  public static IBooleanItem opNumericGreaterThan(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
1002    IBooleanItem retval;
1003    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
1004      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
1005    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
1006      int result = arg1.asInteger().compareTo(arg2.asInteger());
1007      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result > 0);
1008    } else {
1009      int result = arg1.asDecimal().compareTo(arg2.asDecimal());
1010      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result > 0);
1011    }
1012    return retval;
1013  }
1014
1015  /**
1016   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1017   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-numeric-less-than">op:numeric-less-than</a>.
1018   *
1019   * @param arg1
1020   *          the first number to check
1021   * @param arg2
1022   *          the second number to check
1023   * @return {@code true} if the first number is less than or equal to the second,
1024   *         or {@code false} otherwise
1025   */
1026  @NonNull
1027  public static IBooleanItem opNumericLessThan(@Nullable INumericItem arg1, @Nullable INumericItem arg2) {
1028    IBooleanItem retval;
1029    if (arg1 == null || arg2 == null) {
1030      retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
1031    } else if (arg1 instanceof IIntegerItem || arg2 instanceof IIntegerItem) {
1032      int result = arg1.asInteger().compareTo(arg2.asInteger());
1033      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result < 0);
1034    } else {
1035      int result = arg1.asDecimal().compareTo(arg2.asDecimal());
1036      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(result < 0);
1037    }
1038    return retval;
1039  }
1040
1041  /**
1042   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1043   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-equal">op:boolean-equal</a>.
1044   *
1045   * @param arg1
1046   *          the first boolean to check
1047   * @param arg2
1048   *          the second boolean to check
1049   * @return {@code true} if the first boolean is equal to the second, or
1050   *         {@code false} otherwise
1051   */
1052  @NonNull
1053  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanEqual(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1054    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1055    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1056
1057    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(left == right);
1058  }
1059
1060  /**
1061   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1062   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-greater-than">op:boolean-greater-than</a>.
1063   *
1064   * @param arg1
1065   *          the first boolean to check
1066   * @param arg2
1067   *          the second boolean to check
1068   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is {@link IBooleanItem#TRUE} and
1069   *         the second is {@link IBooleanItem#FALSE}, or {@code false} otherwise
1070   */
1071  @NonNull
1072  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanGreaterThan(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1073    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1074    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1075
1076    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(left && !right);
1077  }
1078
1079  /**
1080   * Based on XPath 3.1 <a href=
1081   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-boolean-less-than">op:boolean-less-than</a>.
1082   *
1083   * @param arg1
1084   *          the first boolean to check
1085   * @param arg2
1086   *          the second boolean to check
1087   * @return {@code true} if the first argument is {@link IBooleanItem#FALSE} and
1088   *         the second is {@link IBooleanItem#TRUE}, or {@code false} otherwise
1089   */
1090  @NonNull
1091  public static IBooleanItem opBooleanLessThan(@Nullable IBooleanItem arg1, @Nullable IBooleanItem arg2) {
1092    boolean left = arg1 != null && arg1.toBoolean();
1093    boolean right = arg2 != null && arg2.toBoolean();
1094
1095    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(!left && right);
1096  }
1097}
